------
= **[[[achievement-badges-for-translators|翻译成就徽章墙]]]**

[[f<image https://smlt.wdfiles.com/local--files/odeo%3Atings3/%E8%90%8C%E8%8A%BD.png width="120"]]
@@@@
@@@@
[[size 180%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**萌芽！**[[/span]][[/size]]
**发布一个合格翻译页面**
~~~~
[[f<image https://smlt.wdfiles.com/local--files/odeo%3Atings3/%E5%BC%80%E9%BB%91%E5%95%A6.png width="120"]]
@@@@
@@@@
[[size 180%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**开黑啦**[[/span]][[/size]]
**与他人进行一次合译**
~~~~
[[f<image https://smlt.wdfiles.com/local--files/odeo%3Atings3/%E4%B8%93%E4%B8%9A.png width="120"]]
@@@@
@@@@
[[size 180%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**我们是专业的**[[/span]][[/size]]
**建立作者页时，只发布过翻译页面**
~~~~
[[f<image https://smlt.wdfiles.com/local--files/odeo:tings3/%E6%BC%AB%E6%B8%B8%E8%80%852.png width="120"]]
@@@@
@@@@
[[size 180%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**[[span class="ruby"]]漫游者[[span class="rt"]]wanderers[[/span]][[/span]]的夜歌**[[/span]][[/size]]
**翻译五篇被放逐者之图书馆的作品（带有“wanderers”标签）**
~~~~
[[f<image https://smlt.wdfiles.com/local--files/odeo%3Atings3/%E5%B0%8F%E6%9C%89%E6%88%90%E5%B0%B1z width="120"]]
@@@@
@@@@
[[size 180%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**小有成就**[[/span]][[/size]]
**发布十个合格翻译页面**
~~~~
[[f<image https://smlt.wdfiles.com/local--files/odeo%3Atings3/%E7%BD%91%E8%AF%BE.png width="120"]]
@@@@
@@@@
[[size 180%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**精品课展播**[[/span]][[/size]]
**翻译一篇指导（带有“指导”标签）**
~~~~
------
= **[[[hal-aki-achievement-badges|成就徽章]]]**

[[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]]
[[f<image https://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/%E5%AE%9F%E7%B8%BE_%E5%8F%82%E5%8A%A0%E8%A1%A8%E6%98%8E.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**加入证明**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**被批准加入网站**[[/size]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]]
[[f<image https://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/%E5%AE%9F%E7%B8%BE_%E3%81%AF%E3%81%98%E3%82%81%E3%81%BE%E3%81%97%E3%81%A6%E3%81%AE%E6%8C%A8%E6%8B%B6.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**初次见面**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**在讨论区发言**[[/size]]
[[/div]]
~~~~
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]]
[[f<image https://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/%E5%AE%9F%E7%B8%BE_%E7%A7%98%E5%AF%86%E3%81%AE%E5%AE%9F%E9%A8%93%E5%AE%A4.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**秘密实验室**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**在沙盒中创建自己的页面**[[/size]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]]
[[f<image https://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/%E5%AE%9F%E7%B8%BE_%E4%B8%89%E4%BA%BA%E5%AF%84%E3%82%8C%E3%81%B0.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**三人行**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**在讨论区发布草稿**[[/size]]
[[/div]]
~~~~
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]]
[[f<image https://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/%E5%AE%9F%E7%B8%BE_%E5%B0%8F%E3%81%95%E3%81%AA%E4%B8%80%E6%AD%A9.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**一小步**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**发布一篇文档**[[/size]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]]
[[f<image https://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/%E5%AE%9F%E7%B8%BE_%E6%8E%A1%E7%94%A8%E9%80%9A%E7%9F%A5.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**录取通知**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**创建人事档案**[[/size]]
[[/div]]
~~~~
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]]
[[f<image https://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/%E5%AE%9F%E7%B8%BE_%E3%81%8A%E7%A5%AD%E3%82%8A%E5%A5%BD%E3%81%8D.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**喜欢祭典**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**参加一次竞赛**[[/size]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]]
[[f<image https://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/%E5%AE%9F%E7%B8%BE_%E9%8A%85%E3%83%A1%E3%83%80%E3%83%AB.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**铜奖章**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**发布一篇评分15以上的文档**[[/size]]
[[/div]]
~~~~
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]]
[[f<image https://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/%E5%AE%9F%E7%B8%BE_%E3%81%BF%E3%81%AA%E3%82%89%E3%81%84%E3%83%BB%E3%81%BB%E3%82%93%E3%82%84%E3%81%8F.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**翻译学徒**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**翻译5篇以上的外语文档**[[/size]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]]
[[f<image https://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/%E5%AE%9F%E7%B8%BE_%E3%83%9F%E3%82%B9%E3%82%BF%E3%83%BC%E3%83%BB%E3%81%BB%E3%82%93%E3%82%84%E3%81%8F.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**翻译先生**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**翻译10篇以上的外语文档**[[/size]]
[[/div]]
~~~~
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]]
[[f<image https://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/%E5%AE%9F%E7%B8%BE_%E8%AA%B0%E3%81%8B%E3%81%AE%E6%97%A5%E5%B8%B8.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**某人的日常**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**发布一篇评分20以上的、不包含基金会工作人员的故事**[[/size]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]]

[[/div]]
~~~~

= **[[[scp-achievement-badges|SCP成就徽章]]]**

[[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]]
[[f<image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-achievement-badges/Attendance.png]]
[[size 180%]]**参与证明**[[/size]]

发布一个作者页，给合作档案添加记录，参与一次SCP维基上的官方竞赛。
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]]
[[f<image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-achievement-badges/1K.jpg]]
[[size 180%]]**千元户**[[/size]]

参加任意整千竞赛（例如SCP-1000、SCP-2000、SCP-3000，等等）
[[/div]]

~~~~
